Question & Options:

Options:
A. A. Mr. Awasthi is Raju's principal.
B. B. Raju participates in a quiz competition.
C. C. Mr. Awasthi is Raju's classmate.
D. D. The principal sends Raju's name to a quiz competition.

In the movie 'Good Boy Bad Boy' (2007), which of the following statements are true regarding Raju's actions related to Rajan Malhotra and the C-section?
Options:
A. A) Raju successfully swaps places with Rajan Malhotra.
B. B) Raju enters the C-section for the first time.
C. C) Rajan Malhotra is unaware of Raju's plan.
D. D) Raju is a medical professional.

In the movie 'Good Boy Bad Boy' (2007), which of the following statements accurately describe Raju's relationship with the A-section student?
Options:
A. A. Raju develops feelings for a student from the A-section.
B. B. Raju is indifferent towards the A-section student.
C. C. Raju's feelings for the A-section student lead to significant plot developments.
D. D. Raju's relationship with the A-section student is purely platonic.

In the movie 'Good Boy Bad Boy' (2007), how does Mr. Awasthi influence the students' academic journey?
Options:
A. He divides students into sections based on their merit.
B. He encourages all students to work together regardless of their grades.
C. He provides extra tutoring for students in the A-section.
D. He implements strict discipline for students in the C-section.
Correct Answer: He divides students into sections based on their merit.

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Good Boy Bad Boy' (2007), which of the following statements are true regarding Raju Malhotra's actions related to the A-section?
Options:
A. Raju is a highly performing student who belongs to the A-section.
B. Raju attempts to enter the A-section despite his poor academic performance.
C. Raju is encouraged by his friends to join the A-section.
D. Raju faces challenges due to his status as a poorly performing student.
Correct Answer: Raju attempts to enter the A-section despite his poor academic performance.; Raju faces challenges due to his status as a poorly performing student.

Question & Options:

Options:
A. A. Rajan Malhotra is a geeky student.
B. B. Rajan Malhotra gained access to the A-section due to his low marks.
C. C. Rajan Malhotra's high marks allowed him to enter the A-section.
D. D. The A-section is reserved for students with high academic performance.

In the movie 'Good Boy Bad Boy' (2007), which of the following statements are true regarding Raju Malhotra and the dance competition?
Options:
A. Raju Malhotra is a participant in the dance competition.
B. Raju Malhotra's name is sent to the dance competition by the principal.
C. The dance competition is held to promote academic excellence.
D. Raju Malhotra wins the dance competition.
Correct Answer: Raju Malhotra is a participant in the dance competition., Raju Malhotra's name is sent to the dance competition by the principal.
